Parameter.Name: Calculate Loads
Parameter.Whatis: If checked compute boundary reaction forces.

Parameter.Name: Free text
Parameter.Whatis: Free text is copied into the Solver-block of the SIF as such.
Parameter.StatusTip: Free text is copied into the Solver-block of the SIF as such.

Parameter.Name: Velocity 1
Parameter.Whatis: Initial condition for the velocity in coordinate direction 1.

Parameter.Name: Velocity 2
Parameter.Whatis: Initial condition for the velocity in coordinate direction 2.

Parameter.Name: Velocity 3
Parameter.Whatis: Initial condition for the velocity in coordinate direction 3.

Parameter.Name: Pressure
Parameter.Whatis: Initial condition for the pressure.

Parameter.Name: Free text
Parameter.Whatis: Free text is copied into the Initial Condition-block of the SIF as such.
Parameter.StatusTip: Free text is copied into the Initial Condition-block of the SIF as such.

Parameter.Name: Convect
Parameter.Whatis: If checked, solve Navier-Stokes equations with convection.

Parameter.Name: Element Codes
Parameter.Whatis: Define element degrees of freedom (p:n d:n n:n e:n f:n b:n d:n). "p" is the p-element degree, "e" number of edge DOFs, "f" number of face DOFs, "b" number of bubble DOFs, and "d" the Discontinuous Galerkin DOFs (0 = element number of nodes). "p" and "b" may be entered together, "d" on its own, and the rest together.

Parameter.Name: Free text
Parameter.Whatis: Free text is copied into the Equation-block of the SIF as such.
Parameter.StatusTip: Free text is copied into the Equation-block of the SIF as such.

Parameter.Name: Force 1
Parameter.Whatis: Volume force in coordinate direction 1.

Parameter.Name: Force 2
Parameter.Whatis: Volume force in coordinate direction 2.

Parameter.Name: Force 3
Parameter.Whatis: Volume force in coordinate direction 3.

Parameter.Name: Boussinesq
Parameter.Whatis: Use Boussinesq body force for incompressible flow.

Parameter.Name: Hydrostatic pressure
Parameter.Whatis: If the Boussinesq model is on compute hydrostatic pressure field instead of the default deviation from the hydrostatic field. Otherwise also add the gravity force.

Parameter.Name: Potential Force
Parameter.Whatis: If checked, the force used for the electricstatic coupling is activated.

Parameter.Name: Potential Field
Parameter.Whatis: The field to which gradient the external force is proportional to. For example the electrostatic field.

Parameter.Name: Potential Coefficient
Parameter.Whatis: The coefficient that multiplies the gradient term. For example, the charge density.

Parameter.Name: Velocity 1
Parameter.Whatis: Dirichlet condition for the velocity in coordinate direction 1.

Parameter.Name: Velocity 2
Parameter.Whatis: Dirichlet condition for the velocity in coordinate direction 2.

Parameter.Name: Velocity 3
Parameter.Whatis: Dirichlet condition for the velocity in coordinate direction 3.

Parameter.Name: Velocity 1 Condition
Parameter.Whatis: If the given value is less than zero, don't set the Dirichlet condition. To be generally useful space and/or time varying values may be given.

Parameter.Name: Velocity 2 Condition
Parameter.Whatis: If the given value is less than zero, don't set the Dirichlet condition. To be generally useful space and/or time varying values may be given.

Parameter.Name: Velocity 3 Condition
Parameter.Whatis: If the given value is less than zero, don't set the Dirichlet condition. To be generally useful space and/or time varying values may be given.

Parameter.Name: Free text
Parameter.Whatis: Free text is copied into the Body Force-block of the SIF as such.
Parameter.StatusTip: Free text is copied into the Body Force-block of the SIF as such.

Parameter.Name: Viscosity
Parameter.Whatis: The molecular viscosity of the material.

Parameter.Name: Viscosity Model
Parameter.Whatis: The non-newtionian and turbulent viscosity models.

Parameter.Name: Compressibility Model
Parameter.Whatis: Compressibility model for the flow computations.

Parameter.Name: Porous Media
Parameter.Whatis: If checked, the porous model will be active in the material.

Parameter.Name: Porous Resistance
Parameter.Whatis: This keyword may give a constant resistance or also a orthotropic resistance where the resistance of each velocity component is given separately.

Parameter.Name: Free text
Parameter.Whatis: Free text is copied into the Material-block of the SIF as such.
Parameter.StatusTip: Free text is copied into the Material-block of the SIF as such.

Parameter.Name: Use normal-tangential coordinate system
Parameter.Whatis: The Dirichlet conditions for the vector variables may be given in normal-tangential coordinate system instead of the coordinate axis directed system. The first component will in this case be the normal component and the components 2, 3 two orthogonal tangent directions.

Parameter.Name: Change of variables
Parameter.Whatis: If checked, do change of variables from x,y,z -> n,t1,t2. This change of variables is only needed if Dirichlet conditions are present.

Parameter.Name: Noslip wall BC
Parameter.Whatis: Noslip condition for velocities + turbulence variables.

Parameter.Name: Velocity 1
Parameter.Whatis: Dirichlet condition for the velocity in coordinate direction 1.

Parameter.Name: Velocity 2
Parameter.Whatis: Dirichlet condition for the velocity in coordinate direction 2.

Parameter.Name: Velocity 3
Parameter.Whatis: Dirichlet condition for the velocity in coordinate direction 3.

Parameter.Name: Velocity 1 Condition
Parameter.Whatis: If the given value is less than zero, don't set the Dirichlet condition. To be generally useful space and/or time varying values may be given.

Parameter.Name: Velocity 2 Condition
Parameter.Whatis: If the given value is less than zero, don't set the Dirichlet condition. To be generally useful space and/or time varying values may be given.

Parameter.Name: Velocity 3 Condition
Parameter.Whatis: If the given value is less than zero, don't set the Dirichlet condition. To be generally useful space and/or time varying values may be given.

Parameter.Name: External Pressure
Parameter.Whatis: A pressure boundary condition directed normal to the surface.

Parameter.Name: Pressure 1
Parameter.Whatis: A pressure force in the coordinate direction 1.

Parameter.Name: Pressure 2
Parameter.Whatis: A pressure force in the coordinate direction 2.

Parameter.Name: Pressure 3
Parameter.Whatis: A pressure force in the coordinate direction 3.

Parameter.Name: Surface Tension Coefficient
Parameter.Whatis: Tangential derivative of this coefficient is used as (tangential) force.

Parameter.Name: Surface Tension Expansion Coefficient
Parameter.Whatis: Triggers a tangetial stress boundary condition to be used. If the keyword Surface Tension Expansion Coefficient is given, a linear dependence of the surface tension coefficient on the temperature is assumed. Note that this boundary condition is the tangential derivative of the surface tension coefficient.

Parameter.Name: Slip Coefficient 1
Parameter.Whatis: Apply friction type of boundary condition: slip_i*u_i - (tau,n)_i = f_i."

Parameter.Name: Slip Coefficient 2
Parameter.Whatis: Apply friction type of boundary condition: slip_i*u_i - (tau,n)_i = f_i."

Parameter.Name: Slip Coefficient 3
Parameter.Whatis: Apply friction type of boundary condition: slip_i*u_i - (tau,n)_i = f_i."

Parameter.Name: Velocity 1 periodic
Parameter.Whatis: If checked treat velocity component 1 as a periodic.

Parameter.Name: Velocity 2 periodic
Parameter.Whatis: If checked treat velocity component 2 as a periodic.

Parameter.Name: Velocity 3 periodic
Parameter.Whatis: If checked, treat velocity component 3 as a periodic.

Parameter.Name: Pressure periodic
Parameter.Whatis: If checked, treat pressure as a periodic.

Parameter.Name: Free text
Parameter.Whatis: Free text is copied into the Boundary Condition-block of the SIF as such.
Parameter.StatusTip: Free text is copied into the Boundary Condition-block of the SIF as such.
